author: andschwa
body: This imports the [TestPSReadLine](https://github.com/lzybkr/PSReadLine/tree/master/TestPSReadLine) app for testing purposes. Example run command on Linux: ``` sh dotnet restore dotnet build -c Linux LD_LIBRARY_PATH+=$(pwd)/../../src/Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreConsoleHost ./bin/Linux/netcoreapp1.0/ubuntu.14.04-x64/TestPSReadLine ``` --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/923)
title: Import TestPSReadLine
